name: Employee Directory
about: A site ment to reflect an employee directory that could be used internally in any company.

name: Budget Tracker
about: A Progressive Web Application that can be downloaded on a phone or desktop as well as having offline functionality.

name: Team Profile Manager
about: A back end application that, after answering questions in the command line about your team, will generate a web page displaying those team members and their roles.

name: E-Commerce Back End
about: A back end application replicating an e-commerce web site.

name: Workout Tracker
about: A Full Stack web application that can store and update user data.

name: Spoofify
about: A website that allows users to login to Spotify and search songs through Spotify's API. Saves user data to track tokens to Spotify's API.
